firmwareParameters.description: Period of position or activity messages in motion, start/end, activity or permanent operating mode.
Period of LoRa heartbeat messages.
Period of energy status messages.
Period of the periodic position report.
GPS scan profile for the geoloc engine. Feature not implemented yet
Geolocation sensor profile used in main operating mode and SOS mode.
Geolocation policy used for the side operating modes.
Configuration of GPS antenna.
Number of positions to report during motion events (motion start/end mode only).
Timeout for GPS scans before sending a GPS timeout message.
Timeout for LPGPS scans before sending the timeout message.
Acceptable GPS horizontal error for GPS geolocation.
Time let to the GPS module to refine the calculated position.
Configuration flags.

properties.name: framePendingMechanism
properties.description: false: Frame pending mechanism is disabled. true: Frame pending mechanism is enabled.

properties.name: buttonPressToTurnOFF
properties.description: false: Cannot turn OFF device with a button press.true: Can turn OFF device with a button press.

properties.name: doubleClickIsSosModeOrAlert
properties.description: false: Double button click triggers an Alert. true: Double button click starts SOS mode, another double click stops it.

properties.name: downlinkSetParameterConfirmation
properties.description: false: Confirmation uplink mechanism is disabled. true: Confirmation uplink mechanism is enabled. Factory default value

properties.name: wifiPayloadWithNoCypher
properties.description: false: Wifi payload is cyphered.  true: Wifi payload is not cyphered.

properties.name: bleAdvertisingAtStart
properties.description: false: BLE advertising is disabled. Factory default value.  true: BLE advertising is enabled.

properties.name: selectWifiScanOrGeolocStartMessage
properties.description: false: Enable geoloc start event message when starting a geoloc sequence. true: Enable Wifi scan when starting a geoloc sequence.

properties.name: ledBlinkWithGpsFix
properties.description: false: No blink when a GPS fix is received. Factory default value.true: LED Blink when a GPS fix is received.

properties.name: startMotionEventUplink
properties.description: false: Start Motion event payload is disabled. Factory default value.true: Start Motion event payload is enabled.

properties.name: endMotionEventUplink
properties.description: false: End Motion event payload is disabled. Factory default value. true: End Motion event payload is enabled.

properties.name: otaJoinWhenLeavingModeOff
properties.description: false: Disable OTA join when leaving mode OFF. Factory default value.true: Enable OTA join when leaving mode OFF.

properties.name: rejectAsymmetricPairing
properties.description: false: Accept asymmetric BLE pairing. Factory default value.  true: Reject asymmetric BLE pairing.

properties.name: enableLongWifiPayload
properties.description: false: Long wifi payload is disabled. Factory default value. true: Long wifi payload is enabled.

properties.name: collectionLongReport
properties.description: false: The usual payload size is used (36 bytes). true: The number of entries carried in the uplink is larger and use a payload size of 91 bytes.

properties.name: autoStart
properties.description: false: Once LoRa join succeeds, the user needs to make another long press to actually start in the configured operating mode.true: Once LoRa join succeeds, the device automatically starts without requiring a long press.

properties.name: forbidModeOff
properties.description: false: Mode OFF is allowed. Factory default value. true: Mode OFF is forbidden. When Mode OFF is requested, the device goes in Standby mode instead.

properties.description: Report the transitions normal to critical.

firmwareParameters.description: Angle detection reporting period between repetitions, in seconds.
Defines how many times an angle detection report is repeated.
Rising time phase duration, in seconds.
Falling time phase duration, in seconds.
Learning time phase duration, in seconds.
Accuracy in mg applied to the acceleration measures.
Angle from previously reported orientation which triggers a new orientation report.
No report sent before the delay from the previous report, any deviation before this delay will be ignored.
No report sent after this delay from previous report, an update of current gravity vector will be sent regardless of delta value after this time.
Defines the initialization value of the profile. It is used when the device is powered on for the first time or resets.
Password used to configure User CLI access.
Time in seconds to abort the GPS geolocation when not enough satellites are in view.
Time in seconds to abort the current GPS geoloc if there is no GPS position at the end of the configured period.
Time in milliseconds for geofencing BLE scan duration.
Represents the beaconing advertising type.
Beaconing TX power in dBm.
When beaconing is active and the tracker is static, the beaconing static interval represents the time in milliseconds for beacon advertising period.
When beaconing is active and the tracker is moving, the beaconing motion interval represents the time in milliseconds for beacon advertising period.
When Beaconing is active, time in seconds to be considered in motion when receiving a motion event.
Time in seconds for BLE advertisement duration when the device is not bonded.
It must be used to change dynamically the profile. The value is not stored in flash, and the device will restart with Default Profile after an empty battery or a reset.
Number of positions to report during motion events (motion start/end mode only).

properties.description: false: The usual payload size is used (36 bytes). true: The number of entries carried in the uplink is larger and use a payload size of 91 bytes.

properties.name: autoStart
properties.description: false: Once LoRa join succeeds, the user needs to make another long press to actually start in the configured operating mode.true: Once LoRa join succeeds, the device automatically starts without requiring a long press.

properties.name: forbidModeOff
properties.description: false: Mode OFF is allowed. Factory default value. true: Mode OFF is forbidden. When Mode OFF is requested, the device goes in Standby mode instead.

properties.name: sosModeSound
properties.description: false: SOS mode sound disabled. true: SOS mode sound is enabled.

properties.name: automaticDatarateSelection
properties.description: false: automatic datarate selection is disabled. true: automatic datarate selection is enabled.

properties.name: extendedPosition
properties.description: false: Position messages are using Common Header. true: Position messages are using Extended Common Header and the format of some positions is changed.

properties.name: bleCli
properties.description: false: BLE CLI disabled. true: BLE CLI enabled.

properties.name: blePasskey
properties.description: true: the tracker will require the passkey for the bonding procedure.

firmwareParameters.description: Duration of the GPS standby mode before going OFF.
This parameter provides the configuration of the sensitivity of the shock detection from 1 to 100%.
Acceptable GPS horizontal error for GPS geolocation. Applied when the tracker is in motion.
Time let to the GPS module to refine the calculated position. Applied when the tracker is in motion.
Time in seconds to abort the GPS geolocation when not enough satellites are in view. Applied when the tracker is in motion.
Allows a fine tuning of the acceleration intensity to trigger a motion event.

properties.name: sensitivity
properties.description: mode and sensitivity parameter.

properties.name: outputDataRate
properties.description: defines the output data rate

properties.name: fullScale
properties.description: defines the full-scale

firmwareParameters.description: Defines the delay needed without any motion detection to generate a motion end event.
BLE scan duration.
Allows a fine tuning of the acceleration intensity to trigger a motion event.

properties.name: sensitivity
properties.description: mode and sensitivity parameter.

properties.name: outputDataRate
properties.description: defines the output data rate

properties.name: fullScale
properties.description: defines the full-scale

firmwareParameters.description: Configuration flags.

properties.name: framePendingMechanism
properties.description: false: Frame pending mechanism is disabled. true: Frame pending mechanism is enabled.

properties.name: buttonPressToTurnOFF
properties.description: false: Cannot turn OFF device with a button press.true: Can turn OFF device with a button press.

properties.name: doubleClickIsSosModeOrAlert
properties.description: false: Double button click triggers an Alert. true: Double button click starts SOS mode, another double click stops it.

properties.name: downlinkSetParameterConfirmation
properties.description: false: Confirmation uplink mechanism is disabled. true: Confirmation uplink mechanism is enabled. Factory default value

properties.name: wifiPayloadWithNoCypher
properties.description: false: Wifi payload is cyphered.  true: Wifi payload is not cyphered.

properties.name: bleAdvertisingAtStart
properties.description: false: BLE advertising is disabled. Factory default value.  true: BLE advertising is enabled.

properties.name: selectWifiScanOrGeolocStartMessage
properties.description: false: Enable geoloc start event message when starting a geoloc sequence. true: Enable Wifi scan when starting a geoloc sequence.

properties.name: ledBlinkWithGpsFix
properties.description: false: No blink when a GPS fix is received. Factory default value.true: LED Blink when a GPS fix is received.

properties.name: startMotionEventUplink
properties.description: false: Start Motion event payload is disabled. Factory default value.true: Start Motion event payload is enabled.

properties.name: endMotionEventUplink
properties.description: false: End Motion event payload is disabled. Factory default value. true: End Motion event payload is enabled.

properties.name: otaJoinWhenLeavingModeOff
properties.description: false: Disable OTA join when leaving mode OFF. Factory default value.true: Enable OTA join when leaving mode OFF.

properties.name: rejectAsymmetricPairing
properties.description: false: Accept asymmetric BLE pairing. Factory default value.  true: Reject asymmetric BLE pairing.

properties.name: enableLongWifiPayload
properties.description: false: Long wifi payload is disabled. Factory default value. true: Long wifi payload is enabled.

properties.name: collectionLongReport
properties.description: false: The usual payload size is used (36 bytes). true: The number of entries carried in the uplink is larger and use a payload size of 91 bytes.

properties.name: autoStart
properties.description: false: Once LoRa join succeeds, the user needs to make another long press to actually start in the configured operating mode.true: Once LoRa join succeeds, the device automatically starts without requiring a long press.

properties.name: forbidModeOff
properties.description: false: Mode OFF is allowed. Factory default value. true: Mode OFF is forbidden. When Mode OFF is requested, the device goes in Standby mode instead.

properties.name: sosModeSound
properties.description: false: SOS mode sound disabled. true: SOS mode sound is enabled.

properties.name: automaticDatarateSelection
properties.description: false: automatic datarate selection is disabled. true: automatic datarate selection is enabled.

properties.name: extendedPosition
properties.description: false: Position messages are using Common Header. true: Position messages are using Extended Common Header and the format of some positions is changed.

properties.name: bleCli
properties.description: false: BLE CLI disabled. true: BLE CLI enabled.

properties.name: blePasskey
properties.description: true: the tracker will require the passkey for the bonding procedure.

properties.name: wifiDatabase
properties.description: true: the tracker will send WIFI and GPS position on motion end.

properties.name: activeWifiScan
properties.description: true: active WIFI scan.

firmwareParameters.description: Bitmap enabling the LoRaWAN confirmation of specific type of uplink message.

properties.name: framePending
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of frame pending message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of frame pending message

properties.name: position
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of position message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of position message

properties.name: energyStatus
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of energy status message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of energy status message

properties.name: healthStatus
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of health status message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of health status message

properties.name: heartbeat
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of heartbeat message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of heartbeat message

properties.name: activityStatus
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of activityStatus message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of activityStatus message

properties.name: configuration
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of configuration message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of configuration message

properties.name: shockDetection
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of shockDetection message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of shockDetection message

properties.name: shutdown
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of shutdown message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of shutdown message

properties.name: event
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of event message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of event message

properties.name: scanCollection
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of scanCollection message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of scanCollection message

properties.name: proximity
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of proximity message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of proximity message

properties.name: sms
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of SMS message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of SMS message

properties.name: extendedPosition
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of extendedPosition message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of extendedPosition message

properties.name: debug
properties.description: false: Disables the LoRaWAN confirmation of debug message. true: Enables the LoRaWAN confirmation of debug message
